alert.note: Alert for Chippewa; Renville; Yellow Medicine (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 11 at 12:37PM CDT until May 11 at 1:15PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: The National Weather Service in the Twin Cities has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Chippewa County in west central Minnesota... Eastern Yellow Medicine County in west central Minnesota... Northwestern Renville County in central Minnesota... * Until 115 PM CDT. * At 1237 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Cottonwood, or 14 miles northeast of Marshall, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Wood Lake around 1245 PM CDT. Hanley Falls around 1250 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Granite Falls and Maynard. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
